work.name: University of Edinburgh
work.summary: I work at the Autonomous Agents Research Group for explainable AI for autonomous driving and driving behavior modeling via reinforcement learning.

publications.name: Runtime Unknown Unsafe Scenarios Identification for SOTIF of Autonomous Vehicles
publications.summary: We extended the Silent Testing method to perception and employed a lane marking detection algorithm as an example to demonstrate its effectiveness. We also demonstrated the method's ability to validate autonomous driving systems in urban scenarios.

publications.name: The Application of Driver Models in the Safety Assessment of Autonomous Vehicles: Perspectives, Insights, Prospects
publications.summary: We identified two key roles of driver models for the safety assessment of autonomous vehicles. They are driver model for simulations and driver model for references.

publications.name: The AD4CHE Dataset and its Application in Typical Congestion Scenarios of Traffic Jam Pilot Systems
publications.summary: The paper open-sourced a vehicle trajectory dataset for congestion sceanrios on Chinese highway and expressway.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
